Here with the Portal and all 18 workshops at level 4, I have a Factor of 165% so it adds a 65% production bonus to all my settlement buildings (in addition to the 42% of my blooming trader guild at lvl 31)[BR][BR][IMG]https://i.ibb.co/6WG514m/https-beta-forum-elvenar-com-index-php-attachments-1690306413317-png-11610.png[/IMG][IMG]https://i.ibb.co/cYQSBpS/https-beta-forum-elvenar-com-index-php-attachments-1690306718618-png-11611.png[/IMG][BR][BR]Remember, required Prosperity increases each time you add a settlement building or upgrade one.
